verses.verse: וַיִּקְרְב֥וּ <WH7126> drew nigh יְמֵֽי־ <WH3117> Now the days דָוִ֖ד <WH1732> of David לָמ֑וּת <WH4191> that he should die וַיְצַ֛ו <WH6680> and he charged אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁלֹמֹ֥ה <WH8010> Solomon בְנ֖וֹ <WH1121> his son לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

אָנֹכִ֣י <WH595> I הֹלֵ֔ךְ <WH1980> I go בְּדֶ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> the way כָּל־ <WH3605> of all הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of all the earth וְחָזַקְתָּ֖ <WH2388> be thou strong וְהָיִ֥יתָֽ <WH1961> and show לְאִֽישׁ׃ <WH376> therefore and shew thyself a man

וְשָׁמַרְתָּ֞ <WH8104> And keep אֶת־ <WH853> מִשְׁמֶ֣רֶת ׀ <WH4931> the charge יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֗יךָ <WH430> thy God לָלֶ֤כֶת <WH1980> to walk בִּדְרָכָיו֙ <WH1870> in his ways לִשְׁמֹ֨ר <WH8104> to keep חֻקֹּתָ֤יו <WH2708> his statutes מִצְוֹתָיו֙ <WH4687> and his commandments וּמִשְׁפָּטָ֣יו <WH4941> and his judgments וְעֵדְוֹתָ֔יו <WH5715> and his testimonies כַּכָּת֖וּב <WH3789> as it is written בְּתוֹרַ֣ת <WH8451> in the law מֹשֶׁ֑ה <WH4872> of Moses לְמַ֣עַן <WH4616> that תַּשְׂכִּ֗יל <WH7919> that thou mayest prosper אֵ֚ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> you תַּֽעֲשֶׂ֔ה <WH6213> in all that thou doest וְאֵ֛ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> you תִּפְנֶ֖ה <WH6437> and whithersoever thou turnest שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> in it

לְמַעַן֩ <WH4616> so יָקִ֨ים <WH6965> may continue יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> That the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> דְּבָר֗וֹ <WH1697> his word אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which דִּבֶּ֣ר <WH1696> which he spake עָלַי֮ <WH5921> concerning לֵאמֹר֒ <WH559> concerning me saying אִם־ <WH518> If יִשְׁמְר֨וּ <WH8104> take heed בָנֶ֜יךָ <WH1121> If thy children אֶת־ <WH853> דַּרְכָּ֗ם <WH1870> to their way לָלֶ֤כֶת <WH1980> to walk לְפָנַי֙ <WH6440> before בֶּאֱמֶ֔ת <WH571> me in truth בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all לְבָבָ֖ם <WH3824> with all their heart וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> all נַפְשָׁ֑ם <WH5315> and with all their soul לֵאמֹ֕ר <WH559> thee (said לֹֽא־ <WH3808> shall not יִכָּרֵ֤ת <WH3772> there shall not fail לְךָ֙ אִ֔ישׁ <WH376> he) a man מֵעַ֖ל <WH5921> concerning כִּסֵּ֥א <WH3678> on the throne יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וְגַ֣ם <WH1571> also אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> you יָדַ֡עְתָּ <WH3045> Moreover thou knowest אֵת֩ <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> what עָ֨שָׂה <WH6213> did לִ֜י יוֹאָ֣ב <WH3097> also what Joab בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son צְרוּיָ֗ה <WH6870> of Zeruiah אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> what עָשָׂ֣ה <WH6213> to me [and] what he did לִשְׁנֵֽי־ <WH8147> to the two שָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> captains צִבְא֣וֹת <WH6635> of the hosts יִ֠שְׂרָאֵל <WH3478> of Israel לְאַבְנֵ֨ר <WH74> unto Abner בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son נֵ֜ר <WH5369> of Ner וְלַעֲמָשָׂ֤א <WH6021> and unto Amasa בֶן־ <WH1121> the son יֶ֙תֶר֙ <WH3500> of Jether וַיַּ֣הַרְגֵ֔ם <WH2026> whom he slew וַיָּ֥שֶׂם <WH7760> and shed דְּמֵֽי־ <WH1818> the blood מִלְחָמָ֖ה <WH4421> of war בְּשָׁלֹ֑ם <WH7965> in peace וַיִּתֵּ֞ן <WH5414> and put דְּמֵ֣י <WH1818> the blood מִלְחָמָ֗ה <WH4421> of war בַּחֲגֹֽרָתוֹ֙ <WH2290> upon his girdle אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> what בְּמָתְנָ֔יו <WH4975> that [was] about his loins וּֽבְנַעֲל֖וֹ <WH5275> and in his shoes אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> what בְּרַגְלָֽיו׃ <WH7272> that [were] on his feet

וְעָשִׂ֖יתָ <WH6213> Do כְּחָכְמָתֶ֑ךָ <WH2451> therefore according to thy wisdom וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> not תוֹרֵ֧ד <WH3381> go down שֵׂיבָת֛וֹ <WH7872> and let not his hoar head בְּשָׁלֹ֖ם <WH7965> in peace שְׁאֹֽל׃ <WH7585> to the grave ס

וְלִבְנֵ֨י <WH1121> unto the sons בַרְזִלַּ֤י <WH1271> of Barzillai הַגִּלְעָדִי֙ <WH1569> the Gileadite תַּֽעֲשֶׂה־ <WH6213> But shew חֶ֔סֶד <WH2617> kindness וְהָי֖וּ <WH1961> become בְּאֹכְלֵ֣י <WH398> and let them be of those that eat שֻׁלְחָנֶ֑ךָ <WH7979> at thy table כִּי־ <WH3588> for כֵן֙ <WH3651> after that קָרְב֣וּ <WH7126> for so they came אֵלַ֔י <WH413> about בְּבָרְחִ֕י <WH1272> to me when I fled מִפְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> because אַבְשָׁל֥וֹם <WH53> of Absalom אָחִֽיךָ׃ <WH251> thy brother

וְהִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> Behold עִ֠מְּךָ <WH5973> you שִֽׁמְעִ֨י <WH8096> And behold [thou hast] with thee Shimei בֶן־ <WH1121> the son גֵּרָ֥א <WH1617> of Gera בֶן־ הַיְמִינִי֮ <WH1145> a Benjamite מִבַּחֻרִים֒ <WH980> of Bahurim וְה֤וּא <WH1931> who קִֽלְלַ֙נִי֙ <WH7043> which cursed קְלָלָ֣ה <WH7045> curse נִמְרֶ֔צֶת <WH4834> me with a grievous בְּי֖וֹם <WH3117> in the day לֶכְתִּ֣י <WH1980> went מַחֲנָ֑יִם <WH4266> to Mahanaim וְהֽוּא־ <WH1931> he יָרַ֤ד <WH3381> but he came down לִקְרָאתִי֙ <WH7125> to meet הַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <WH3383> me at Jordan וָאֶשָּׁ֨בַֽע <WH7650> and I sware ל֤וֹ בַֽיהוָה֙ <WH3068> to him by the LORD לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying אִם־ <WH518> I will not אֲמִֽיתְךָ֖ <WH4191> I will not put thee to death בֶּחָֽרֶב׃ <WH2719> with the sword

וְעַתָּה֙ <WH6258> Now אַל־ <WH408> nay תְּנַקֵּ֔הוּ <WH5352> Now therefore hold him not guiltless כִּ֛י <WH3588> for אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> man חָכָ֖ם <WH2450> for thou [art] a wise אָ֑תָּה <WH859> and you וְיָֽדַעְתָּ֙ <WH3045> and knowest אֵ֣ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> what תַּֽעֲשֶׂה־ <WH6213> what thou oughtest to do לּ֔וֹ וְהוֹרַדְתָּ֧ <WH3381> bring thou down אֶת־ <WH853> שֵׂיבָת֛וֹ <WH7872> unto him but his hoar head בְּדָ֖ם <WH1818> with blood שְׁאֽוֹל׃ <WH7585> to the grave

וַיִּשְׁכַּ֥ב <WH7901> slept דָּוִ֖ד <WH1732> So David עִם־ <WH5973> with אֲבֹתָ֑יו <WH1> with his fathers וַיִּקָּבֵ֖ר <WH6912> and was buried בְּעִ֥יר <WH5892> in the city דָּוִֽד׃ <WH1732> of David פ

וְהַיָּמִ֗ים <WH3117> And the days אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after מָלַ֤ךְ <WH4427> reigned דָּוִד֙ <WH1732> that David עַל־ <WH5921> over יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> over Israel אַרְבָּעִ֖ים <WH705> [were] forty שָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> years בְּחֶבְר֤וֹן <WH2275> he in Hebron מָלַךְ֙ <WH4427> reigned שֶׁ֣בַע <WH7651> seven שָׁנִ֔ים <WH8141> years וּבִירוּשָׁלִַ֣ם <WH3389> he in Jerusalem מָלַ֔ךְ <WH4427> reigned שְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <WH7970> and thirty וְשָׁלֹ֖שׁ <WH7969> and three שָׁנִֽים׃ <WH8141> years

וּשְׁלֹמֹ֕ה <WH8010> Solomon יָשַׁ֕ב <WH3427> Then sat עַל־ <WH5921> on כִּסֵּ֖א <WH3678> upon the throne דָּוִ֣ד <WH1732> of David אָבִ֑יו <WH1> his father וַתִּכֹּ֥ן <WH3559> was established מַלְכֻת֖וֹ <WH4428> king מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> greatly

וַיָּבֹ֞א <WH935> came אֲדֹנִיָּ֣הוּ <WH138> And Adonijah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son חַגֵּ֗ית <WH2294> of Haggith אֶל־ <WH413> about בַּת־ שֶׁ֙בַע֙ <WH1339> to Bathsheba אֵם־ <WH517> the mother שְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <WH8010> of Solomon וַתֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> And she said הֲשָׁל֣וֹם <WH7965> Peaceably בֹּאֶ֑ךָ <WH935> Comest וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> said שָׁלֽוֹם׃ <WH7965> Peacefully
וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> He said דָּבָ֥ר <WH1697> moreover I have somewhat to say לִ֖י אֵלָ֑יִךְ <WH413> about וַתֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> unto thee And she said דַּבֵּֽר׃ <WH1696> Say on

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> And he said אַ֤תְּ <WH859> You יָדַ֙עַתְּ֙ <WH3045> Thou knowest כִּי־ <WH3588> for לִי֙ הָיְתָ֣ה <WH1961> and become הַמְּלוּכָ֔ה <WH4410> that the kingdom וְעָלַ֞י <WH5921> and שָׂ֧מוּ <WH7760> set כָֽל־ <WH3605> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> was mine and [that] all Israel פְּנֵיהֶ֖ם <WH6440> their faces לִמְלֹ֑ךְ <WH4427> on me that I should reign וַתִּסֹּ֤ב <WH5437> is turned about הַמְּלוּכָה֙ <WH4410> howbeit the kingdom וַתְּהִ֣י <WH1961> and become לְאָחִ֔י <WH251> and is become my brother's כִּ֥י <WH3588> for מֵיְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> for it was his from the LORD הָ֥יְתָה <WH1961> and become לּֽוֹ׃

וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> Now שְׁאֵלָ֤ה <WH7596> petition אַחַת֙ <WH259> one אָֽנֹכִי֙ <WH595> I שֹׁאֵ֣ל <WH7592> And now I ask מֵֽאִתָּ֔ךְ <WH853> אַל־ <WH408> not תָּשִׁ֖בִי <WH7725> of thee deny אֶת־ <WH853> פָּנָ֑י <WH6440> me וַתֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> not And she said אֵלָ֖יו <WH413> to him דַּבֵּֽר׃ <WH1696> unto him Say on

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> And he said אִמְרִי־ <WH559> Speak נָא֙ <WH4994> Please לִשְׁלֹמֹ֣ה <WH8010> I pray thee unto Solomon הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> the king כִּ֥י <WH3588> for לֹֽא־ <WH3808> he will not יָשִׁ֖יב <WH7725> nay אֶת־ <WH853> פָּנָ֑יִךְ <WH6440> thee וְיִתֶּן־ <WH5414> ) that he give לִ֛י אֶת־ <WH853> אֲבִישַׁ֥ג <WH49> me Abishag הַשּׁוּנַמִּ֖ית <WH7767> the Shunammite לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <WH802> to wife

וַתֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said בַּת־ שֶׁ֖בַע <WH1339> And Bathsheba ט֑וֹב <WH2896> Well אָנֹכִ֕י <WH595> I אֲדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> I will speak עָלֶ֖יךָ <WH5921> and אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> for thee unto the king

וַתָּבֹ֤א <WH935> therefore went בַת־ שֶׁ֙בַע֙ <WH1339> Bathsheba אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> unto king שְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <WH8010> Solomon לְדַבֶּר־ <WH1696> to speak ל֖וֹ עַל־ <WH5921> unto אֲדֹנִיָּ֑הוּ <WH138> unto him for Adonijah וַיָּקָם֩ <WH6965> rose up הַמֶּ֨לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king לִקְרָאתָ֜הּ <WH7125> to meet וַיִּשְׁתַּ֣חוּ <WH7812> her and bowed לָ֗הּ וַיֵּ֙שֶׁב֙ <WH3427> himself unto her and sat down עַל־ <WH5921> on כִּסְא֔וֹ <WH3678> on his throne וַיָּ֤שֶׂם <WH7760> to be set כִּסֵּא֙ <WH3678> and caused a seat לְאֵ֣ם <WH517> mother הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> for the king's וַתֵּ֖שֶׁב <WH3427> and she sat לִֽימִינֽוֹ׃ <WH3225> on his right hand

וַתֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> Then she said שְׁאֵלָ֨ה <WH7596> petition אַחַ֤ת <WH259> one קְטַנָּה֙ <WH6996> small אָֽנֹכִי֙ <WH595> I שֹׁאֶ֣לֶת <WH7592> I desire מֵֽאִתָּ֔ךְ <WH853> אַל־ <WH408> not תָּ֖שֶׁב <WH7725> not nay אֶת־ <WH853> פָּנָ֑י <WH6440> me וַיֹּֽאמֶר־ <WH559> said לָ֤הּ הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> And the king שַׁאֲלִ֣י <WH7592> unto her Ask on אִמִּ֔י <WH517> my mother כִּ֥י <WH3588> for לֹֽא־ <WH3808> I will not אָשִׁ֖יב <WH7725> nay אֶת־ <WH853> פָּנָֽיִךְ׃ <WH6440> thee

וַתֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> And she said יֻתַּ֖ן <WH5414> be given אֶת־ <WH853> אֲבִישַׁ֣ג <WH49> Let Abishag הַשֻּׁנַמִּ֑ית <WH7767> the Shunammite לַאֲדֹנִיָּ֥הוּ <WH138> to Adonijah אָחִ֖יךָ <WH251> thy brother לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <WH802> to wife

וַיַּעַן֩ <WH6030> answered הַמֶּ֨לֶךְ <WH4428> And king שְׁלֹמֹ֜ה <WH8010> Solomon וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and said לְאִמּ֗וֹ <WH517> unto his mother וְלָמָה֩ <WH4100> and why אַ֨תְּ <WH859> are you שֹׁאֶ֜לֶת <WH7592> And why dost thou ask אֶת־ <WH853> אֲבִישַׁ֤ג <WH49> Abishag הַשֻּׁנַמִּית֙ <WH7767> the Shunammite לַאֲדֹ֣נִיָּ֔הוּ <WH138> Adonijah וְשַֽׁאֲלִי־ <WH7592> asking לוֹ֙ אֶת־ <WH853> הַמְּלוּכָ֔ה <WH4410> for him the kingdom כִּ֛י <WH3588> for ה֥וּא <WH1931> he אָחִ֖י <WH251> brother הַגָּד֣וֹל <WH1419> also for he [is] mine elder מִמֶּ֑נִּי <WH4480> at וְלוֹ֙ וּלְאֶבְיָתָ֣ר <WH54> even for him and for Abiathar הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <WH3548> the priest וּלְיוֹאָ֖ב <WH3097> and for Joab בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son צְרוּיָֽה׃ <WH6870> of Zeruiah פ

וַיִּשָּׁבַע֙ <WH7650> sware הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> Then king שְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <WH8010> Solomon בַּֽיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> by the LORD לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying כֹּ֣ה <WH3541> so יַֽעֲשֶׂה־ <WH6213> do לִּ֤י אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> God וְכֹ֣ה <WH3541> also יוֹסִ֔יף <WH3254> so to me and more also כִּ֣י <WH3588> if בְנַפְשׁ֔וֹ <WH5315> against his own life דִּבֶּר֙ <WH1696> have not spoken אֲדֹ֣נִיָּ֔הוּ <WH138> if Adonijah אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּבָ֖ר <WH1697> this word הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this
